title: STA 529 2.0 Data Mining
text:
Course Road Map

Week 1: 11/10/2025
Theory
Introduction to data mining
Practical
Exploring missing values
Data quality analysis with dlookr
Your turn: Explore the missing values in the DStidy in DSjobtracker


Week 2: 17/10/2025
Decision tree
Practical: inclass demo
Tutorial: Develop a model to predict the capacity of wind turbines.
library(tidyverse)
turbines <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2020/2020-10-27/wind-turbine.csv")
turbines

set.seed(123)
wind_split <- initial_split(turbines_df, strata = turbine_capacity)
wind_train <- training(wind_split)
wind_test <- testing(wind_split)
Practical-additional reading
Practical-additional reading


Week 3: 25/10/2025
Random forests algorithm
Measures of performance
